name: Radium Hosting
tag_list: web-hosting, cloudflare, softlayer, web-development, seo, web-design, mobile-website-design, cleveland, columbus, ohio
overview:
Radium Hosting provides business class web hosting at SoftLayer®.

Free CloudFlare CDN, GlobalSign SSL sertificates, cPanel and One-Click Script Installs.

Built with high-end hardware on the SoftLayer® Network, Radium Hosting is focused on providing the best customer service in the industry. The diverse backbone network, comprised of Intel® Multi-Core servers, has been built with redundant self healing technology. Your data is safe with us.

Performance is a key aspect of the Radium Hosting platform. Independently monitored servers ensure optimal speed and 99.9% up time. Performance is guaranteed.

We are a CloudFlare certified partner. CloudFlare automatically optimizes the delivery of your web pages and protects your site from harmful attackers and crawlers.

Radium Hosting will do whatever it takes to make our customers happy. Radium Hosting offers SimpleScripts to allow for easy one-click management of over 70 of the web’s top applications, including WordPress, Joomla, Drupal, phpBB, Magento and more.

The affordable web hosting plans at Radium Hosting are packed with features and are tailored to fit any budget. We guarantee 99.9% uptime and if our clients aren’t satisfied, Radium Hosting offers a 90 day money back guarantee.
